/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their facades adorned with vibrant advertisements and billboards, adding a splash of color to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a stark contrast to the concrete structures below. In the distance, the iconic skyline of Beijing can be seen, punctuated by the silhouettes of skyscrapers reaching towards the sky.
